ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Some optimizations to the X10, ZWave and SerialPort driver libraries - Added "Sunrise Colors Scenario" sample script for Philips Hue lights - Added module settings popup to the control page - Fixed occasional crash in shutdown/restart process - Added "Raspberry Pi Camera" resolution modes to camera driver (up to 5Mpx and 90fps) - Fixed bug in Interconnections (decimal fields serialization issue in SignalEvent) - Fixed bug in web service file caching
